name: Marrow (itch) (TonicGames)
description:
A basic oldschool 2D shooter in a randomly generated world, with a twist - killing enemies is necessary to survive. If you go too long without killing anything, the altar will lose its magic power and you will die. The time will run down faster and faster the longer you play, but more enemies and upgraded guns will make sure the action keeps going.

Anything beyond version 1.0.3 is post-jam.

Made feedback and criticism is welcome and encouraged :)

Made by Baconinvader and Valdee.
